item.description:
Hi everyone,
I'd like to invite you to the 9-12er's first ever "Pot Luck Social", I hope you can attend! Please join us for a day of conversation, laughter and fun! We plan on burgers and dogs, please bring your favorite pot luck dish to share with your new friends. Also, BYO for beverages.

There will be familiar faces at the social, plus you will get to chat with those you have not met yet! For anyone who is new to the group or who has not been to a meeting yet, please join us! We want to meet you and share ideas!

Plus if you want to play or bask in the sun, you can do that too! Let's pray for nice weather!

The location will be announced soon. Most likely at one of our historial state parks! See educational too!

Please come if only for a short time, I know how everyone is busy. Especially at short notice. We will be at our social from 1pm until 4pm officially. I am sure there will be many who continue into the evening. Our conversations bring us to this all the time!!!

Please respond and let me know if you intend on joining us by this Monday afternoon. This will allow me to officially book the location.

Join us!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be standing tall for FREEDOM!
item.name: Pot Luck Social with 9-12 RI
